author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1218: Added more complex wiki samples for exception clause. Added some toString so its easier to read in debugger.

author: rjung
msg: Now we put the PCRE libs into a new variable PCRE_LIBS
That way the detected libs for PCRE could be reused in
other parts of the build system if necessary.
Side effect: I had to change the handling of HTTPD_FLAGS on
AIX and OS390 from hard setting of the variable to using
APR_ADDTO(). I hope that macro works on those platforms.

author: veithen
msg: * Swing Listener implementation: changed the Listener-JPanel relationship from inheritance to composition.
* Introduced a common base class for the two Listener implementations.
* Merged the two SocketWaiter implementations into a single class.

author: rdonkin
msg: Write responses when they are available.
